title: Hot Rocks
description: Note: HOT ROCKS is the first half of the book Remember When.When her notorious past catches up with Laine Tavish, proprietor of the antique shop Remember When, it's up to her and an enigmatic stranger named Max Gannon to find out who's chasing her-and why. The answer lies in a hidden fortune that will change Laine's life...
author: Nora Roberts
